title: How to Find an Epic Games Account

steps.title: Log into your Epic Games account.
steps.content: Log into your Epic Games account. You can use a web browser and go to https://www.epicgames.com/account/personal?productName=epicgames&lang=en , or you can log in on your console. Use your email address and Epic Games password to sign in. If you've forgotten your password, click Forgot Your Password? to have a password reset link emailed to you. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Navigate to the settings page.
steps.content: Navigate to the settings page. If you're using a web browser, the link above will take you to the settings page. If you're using a console or gaming platform, you'll most likely need to navigate through your Epic Games account menu to find Settings . If you're having trouble finding settings, you need to open one of your Epic games (e.g., Fortnite ) select a game mode, select Options in the lobby, and then select the gear icon to open your settings. Select the silhouette icon to find your account ID.

steps.title: Locate your Account ID.
steps.content: Locate your Account ID. You'll see this near the top of the screen if you're using a gaming platform, and under the header "Account Info" if you're using a browser. You'll need this identifier if you're ever locked out of your account or hacked and contact Epic Games customer support. [2] X Research source
